description: You are given an array nums of length n and an integer m. You need to determine if it is possible to split the array into n arrays of size 1 by performing a series of steps. An array is called good if: In each step, you can select an existing array (which may be the result of previous steps) with a length of at least two and split it into two arrays, if both resulting arrays are good. Return true if you can split the given array into n arrays, otherwise return false.
